cab.content: From Secretary of State to Viceroy, Foreign Department, V 22nd August 1917.'J r/-- (Repeated to Sir P. Cox.)P33771 Foreign Secret. My predecessors telegram of lOtliMay. Mesopotamia -administration. His Majesty's Government think it, impracticable in present military situation to send proposed Commission to Mesopotamia -during coming cold weather. They propose to postpone project until military situation is clearer. Do you agree ?
